16 year old Lauren was visiting her aunt and uncle in Indiana with her older sister, 18 year old Diana. Being of slim build, she felt overshadowed by Diana's flowing brunette hair, large breasts, a bubble butt, and killer legs. She wanted boys to look at her like they looked at her sister, but as the saying goes, be careful what you wish for...

Lauren woke Sunday morning, rushing to do her morning routine (shower, brush her teeth and hair, and finish packing) before she and her sister would be dropped off at the airport and catch their flight back home. Diana, ever the morning person, was already awake and eating breakfast when she heard her sister groggily enter the bathroom to take her shower. While she was inside, Diana decided to play a small prank on her sister. She removed the underwear Lauren had set aside and packed them in Lairen's suitcase. She quickly took the suitcase and placed it inside their uncle's car, which they would be taking to the airport.

Lauren finished her shower, and dried off with her towel. She dried her hair and went to the bedroom to get dressed. Upon seeing her outfit sans underwear, she cursed her sister, but decided to get dressed before calling her on it. The thin yellow sundress hugged her chest, as it now was unsupported by a bra. In the dining room, she found everyone finishing their breakfast. She went to tell off her sister and ask for her underwear back, but her aunt quickly placed a plate of eggs and toast in front of her and urged her to eat before leaving. Lauren ruefully choked down her breakfast and stood up to ask where her underwear was when her uncle announced it was time to go. Diana pulled Lauren by the wrist and led her out the door, where she grabbed her suitcase to be loaded in the car. The car that was no longer in the driveway.

"Uncle Don, where's your car?" Diana asked.

"Oh, your cousin Jennifer drives it to church on Sundays. You didn't think she would walk, or take my van did you?" the man laughed.

Diana bit her lip, knowing her prank just went too far. Her sister would not only have to enter the airport without underwear, bit sit through the entire flight without them as well. She didn't want to let on about her sister's missing suitcase and quickly loaded her suitcase into the van and they set off. Once there, Diana had to break the bad news to Lauren when she noticed her suitcase was missing. Lauren was shocked that her sister would do such a thing, but her uncle reassure her that her suitcase would be shipped to her, so she wouldn't be without her things for at most a week.

Lauren felt relieved and entered the airport security was easy as she had no metal on her body except her phone and keys she kept in a small clutch. There, standing in front of the two sisters was Hayley Bell. Hayley was in Lauren's class, and had an older sister who was in Diana's grade. Her family was one of the lucky ones, owning a home at the top of the mountain, where they fires didn't manage to climb due to the wind blowing them the other way. Hayley's family thought it would be a good idea to extend a hand to any family beneath them (literally and financially) to come stay with them until they either got a new place or until their house was rebuilt.

The only problem was that Lauren and Hayley shared some history. Lauren, being thin and fit, wanted to try out for cheerleader a couple years ago when they were starting high school. The cheer captain chose Hayley because she was "more mature" (read: had boobs) however, in the intervening years, Lauren had her growth spurt, and was now just as endowed as Hayley, if not bigger. However, the cheer squad didn't take auditions from juniors, so her jealousy was palpable. Now, seeing Hayley's family prosper when hers was in a rough patch didn't make things better. However, Lauren's parents didn't know Hayley, so took her smile and offer at face value.

"That is so kind of your folks to offer shelter to the victims. Though I'm not sure we should take advantage of you when there's clearly worse off families." Lauren's father said.

"Nonsense! With me and Lauren and Diana and my sister Katie, we should get along just fine! Line best friends!" Hayley assured, though Lauren saw through the false sincerity.

However, her family was sold on the idea, and they were led outside to a car, waiting to sleep them to their "temporary" home. The large SUV was able to hold their suitcases on the back, and have room for Lauren's family in the back and Hayley sat up front next to the driver. None of them realized the driver was a chauffeur until Hayley addressed him by name.

"Steve, let's go home." she smiled.

The drive was short, but somewhat heartbreaking as they had to drive past the devastation of the community and even past the wreckage that remained of their home before turning a corner to see just a few yards away, we're pristine homes, seemingly untouched by misfortune. Then, at the end of the street, shining like a beacon in the setting sunlight, was the Bell residence. It was a large mansion that had a U-shaped driveway the size of a large front yard. A Greek fountain was the centerpiece of the lawn, and was impressive as they drove around it before stopping in front of the main house.

"Steve will take your bags to the guest rooms. Lauren and Diana will be in one room, and of course you folks will have a large room with an en suite bathroom to yourselves. Your daughters will be sharing the downstairs half bath and the shower upstairs." Hayley explained to Lauren's parents as they entered.

Steve took the rolling luggage in stride and walked off as Hayley led them from the foyer into the living room that had a grand fireplace. It's walls were covered with bookcases holding many different books from classic literature to historic memoirs and contemporary fiction and even smattering of poetry. It was here that Hayley's parents received them. Her father was a man of similar age to Lauren's, however Mrs. Bell seemed to be not much older than Diana and Hayley's sister Katie. The man sat in a leather upholstered easy chair, his feet on a smiliarly styled ottoman while his wife say on his lap. They both seemed enthralled by whatever he was flipping through on his tablet. They looked up and greeted their guests and introduced themselves.

"Hi, I'm Dr. Perter Bell, and this is my wife Jenny. Yes, she is half my age, and no, she isn't the biological mother of my daughters. She, unfortunately was taken from us upon Hayley's birth. I was so broken, I didn't think I would love again. Then this woman entered my life and pieced me back together. Without her, I probably wouldn't be here today. In fact, I would have been in your position. With her financial advice, I was able to afford this house and everything that came with it. She got along well with my girls, and we were married not long after Hayley finished middle school." the man said.

"I'm Daniel, and my wife Tanya. My daughters Lauren and Diana seem to know your girls, so I hope they become fast friends now." Lauren's father said, shaking the other man's hand.

The Bells showed Lauren's family around. They had their bedrooms upstairs, a workout room, a pool outside with a Jacuzzi. The kitchen didn't have a chef, but it had so many gadgets it almost was like it was able to cook everything for you. There was an entertainment room that had their television and home theater for watching movies. Once they were shown to their rooms, they began unpacking.

Diana was busy putting her things away when Hayley went to check on them. Seeing Lauren lying on her bed made her curious.

"How come you're not unpacking? I assure you I don't mean you and your family any harm. You can rest easy here. We want you to feel welcome." Hayley said, only half meaning it. She wanted to exploit any weakness she could, just for fun.

"Well, funny story. My suitcase is in Indiana, asy jokester sister placed my suitcase in the wrong car, so when we were dropped off at the airport, I didn't have my bag. At least they know about it and should be sending it here as soon as we give them the address." Lauren said.

"So, all you have is what you're wearing?" Hayley had to stop herself from smiling.

"Yeah, that's it! So I have nothing to unpack...yet." Lauren explained.

"You know what? In that case, why don't you come up to my room? I don't mind sharing it, and I'm sure Diana would love to have her own privacy." Hayley said.

Before Lauren could protest, Steve was helping Hayley and her father move the bed from the downstairs guest room to Hayley's room. After some rearranging, the two girls were situated. Lauren was a very pretty girl, whose cute face, shoulder length light brown hair, and blue eyes caught the affection of many guys in her class. Her C cup chest definitely didn't hurt either. She wasn't the most popular girl in school, but since her school was on the smaller side of public schools, most people knew who she was, and she had no problems making friends. She lives with her 21 year old brother, Paul, a 17 year old sister, Jennifer, and her two parents in a suburb of a mid sized town.

But there's tons of pretty girls, so what makes Lauren special? Most of her classmates would tell you it's her down-to-earth personality, bold nature, and unpredictable humor that ensures whatever she has to say is worth listening to. Unfortunately, it is these traits that lead Lauren to an embarrassing predicament she never imagined herself being in.

It all started in October of 2016, one month before the U.S. Presidential Election. Lauren didn't really have an interest in politics, but the rest of her family was split between the two candidates; her mother and older brother supported Clinton while her father and younger sister supported Trump. Luckily, there were never any heated arguments amongst the family, but there was plenty of banter. Despite her disinterest in politics, Lauren had heard about the polls predicting Trump losing by a landslide margin, and it seemed like every week there was some new controversy over some crazy thing the Republican candidate did or said. And though she figured that a lot of it was typical media sensationalism, she had no doubt in her mind that Clinton would emerge the winner because of this.

On the night of the last Presidential Debate, Lauren's more politically opinionated family members of course believed their candidate to have been the superior debater. Lauren only watched a few minutes of the debate, but it didn't change her prediction of the outcome. So when she saw her father post a on social media that "Trump showed the people of this country that he is really capable of being its leader tonight. I think come election day, America will do what's right and MAGA!!!", she laughed. Did her father really believe that one boring debate changed the minds of millions of people? No way.

However, her father's post did give her an idea. Of course Trump will lose, so why not make some outrageous bets on the outcome to be funny? But what, though? She pondered for nearly half an hour in front of her computer some of the craziest things she could "promise" to do if Trump won, like eating her backpack or moving to Antarctica, but decided that those were so far-fetched that it would actually be less funny than something crazy yet still plausible. As funny as hyperbole can be, she believed that reality is much more entertaining than fiction. Back at the drawing board, she tried to think of something ridiculous she could "promise" to do if Trump wins that's crazy enough to get people's attention, yet realistic enough to make her seem bold enough to say it.

After a while of struggling to think of such an idea, she suddenly remembered a controversy that swept through her state a couple years ago, where state legislature narrowly repealed a law outlawing public nudity and indecency after police in the state's largest city arrested hundreds of participants of a "Naked Bike Ride" that raised money for local charities. There was a big uproar amongst the citizens, for a variety of reasons. Some didn't totally approve of the nudity but saw the bike ride as a mostly harmless event that had a positive impact through its charity work. Others were worried that the negative press would see the event move elsewhere, harming the economy that thrived when thousands of out of state visitors spent their money at local businesses. And many just didn't see understand nudity was such a big deal in the first place. And so, all laws against nudity were repealed, though after all that controversy, she has still yet to see one naked person in her town, which opponents of the repeal promised would happen everywhere. Regardless, she found the perfect post. Everyone was going to love it.

Right away, she logged into all her social media accounts and posted something that would soon come back to haunt her.

"If Donald Trump wins, I'll give up my clothes for a year and become a nudist."

Within minutes, her notifications spiked, with dozens of likes and comments across all platforms, just as she expected. Most comments were simply "haha" or the laughing emoji, but some took the status a bit more seriously, commenting things like "are you for real???". Lauren laughed and figured those people probably had higher expectations for Trump. Still, she decided to double down, and post a follow up.

"To those asking if my last status is serious, does it matter? There's literally no way he's going to win. But sure, if he does win, I'll 100% go through with it. Not that it'll happen anyway."

Lauren smiled at her "boldness". It's not like it'll actually happen, but such a claim sure catches one's attention. She cracked up when her dad replied to the latest post with "Don't think I won't hold you to your word :)". Her dad was a goofball, and she liked that they could joke around with each other.

For the next couple weeks, Lauren's family, friends and classmates would casually tease her about the bet, especially if Trump had a slight uptick in the polls. Lauren laughed it off, still standing by her prediction and her promise. Her Trump supporting sister especially found her bet amusing, and not a day went by without her making some sort of comment about her "impending nudity". Lauren would always come back with the suggestion that if

On the day of the U.S. Presidential Election

Lauren didn't even realize it was election day until she saw a few of her friends post things on her page like "Today's the big day!!" and "Nervous??" before she left for school. As she expected, everyone was buzzing about the election, and people were coming up to her asking if she would actually go through with it. Despite her slight nervousness, she was still confident in her prediction, and kept reassuring everyone that she would not welsh on her bet. Even some teachers asked her about it, causing Lauren to blush a bit but still stood by her word.

That night, Lauren didn't bother keeping up with the results and went to bed early, still confident Clinton would win and put to rest to silly bet. Of course, millions were surprised when the Republican nominee surpassed the 270 electoral votes needed to win the election, but practically nobody would be as surprised as Lauren when she wakes to the most shocking news she's ever heard in her life.

1311211.content:
The day after the election

Since she fell asleep before a winner was declared, Lauren was quite confused to wake up to hundreds of notifications on her phone. Upon opening her social media apps, Lauren saw the kinds of notifications she was receiving.

"OMG Lauren!!!" posted by her best friend Kylie.

"DID YOU SEE THE NEWS?!? XD" posted by her sister Jennifer.

"HAHAHAHAHA" posted by some random douchebag who sits next to her in algebra.

These were only a few of the hundreds of similar posts on her profile. Lauren then remembered that the election took place the previous night, and began getting nervous. Trump didn't really win, did he? There's no way! This must be some sort of prank. However, when Lauren opened up her news app and saw the first headline, her heart sank as she realized that this was 100% real. And she lost the bet.

Lauren started to panic. She made that post as a joke! It then occurred to Lauren that she doesn't have to go through with it at all. There's no way she can just donate all her clothes and go naked everywhere! It's not like anyone's actually expecting this, right? Even if she told everyone for weeks that she was being serious? So Lauren made up her mind; she would laugh off the bet as a joke, and hopefully only a few people would be left disappointed.

But then Lauren read more of the posts she was tagged in.

"Like this post if you hope that Lauren will go through with it!" posted by some girl that Lauren only kinda knows. There were hundreds of likes on the post. Lauren started getting the impression that maybe people are expecting her to stay true to her word. Lauren continued reading.

"Guys, do you REALLY think Lauren will actually go naked because of an election? Get real." posted by Kim, a girl who Lauren used to be good friends with but stopped hanging out due to her cynicism and tendency to make smart-ass remarks about everything. Lauren was relieved that at least someone had some sense around here, though she wasn't surprised that it was Kim. However, Kim's post generated quite a bit of discussion, with Lauren's classmates debating in the comments section whether Lauren would welsh or not. This debate was rather one sided, with a few commenters siding with Kim's opinion but the majority at least considering the possibility that she would indeed give up clothing.

Lauren rolled her eyes at first and continued scrolling, but several of her friends' and classmates' comments caught her eye.

"If it were anyone else I'd agree with you Kim, but this is Lauren we're talking about. She's always been super honest and I just can't see her going back on her word like that. It just isn't her character." posted by another female acquaintance, who clearly held Lauren in high esteem.

"Lauren said she would, and I believe her. She's also been saying in school that she was being serious when she posted that. She's not one to welsh, and especially not one to lie." posted by a male classmate who Lauren knew to have a crush on her, though Lauren didn't feel the same way.

There were many more comments like this, expressing their trust in Lauren's word. Lauren suddenly felt conflicted. She was planning on just laughing it off and hoping people forget about it in a few days, but apparently people really are expecting this. It was a pretty obvious decision at first; who would actually give up their clothes and go butt naked everywhere just because of a dumb bet? But post after post admiring Lauren's character and history of honesty started getting to Lauren. If she backed out now, she would be letting a lot of people down, including her friends and family.

Lauren couldn't believe she was actually considering following through with her promise. Naked! For a year! As she started getting ready to take a shower, Lauren intensely debated her options at hand. Ultimately, there were pretty much only two options: 1) Go naked despite the immense embarrassment to uphold her reputation of honesty.... or 2) let a lot of people down to preserve her modesty. While taking her shower, Lauren bounced back and forth between the two options, and continued to do so as she finished her shower and began drying off. Since she took her phone into the bathroom with her, Lauren checked her social media and saw Kim made a new post.

"You can bring up Lauren's character and honesty all you want, it doesn't matter. She's a great and trustworthy person but that doesn't change the fact that she's simply too scared to go through with it. When Lauren shows up today wearing clothes just as any other day, I'll be laughing at all of you for being dumb and naive enough to actually believe anything else was going to happen." Lauren could practically see Kim's smug face as she posted the previous comment right there.

That does it. Lauren was not about to let Kim's smug ass have the last laugh. She could handle being called a coward, but she couldn't allow Kim to get away with snide remarks about the people who trust in her. Typing up a long-winded response to Kim's posts, Lauren desperately wanted to prove her cynical former friend wrong. But just as Lauren nearly hit the send button, she stopped herself. No amount of arguing is going to accomplish anything other than making her appear immature and insecure. She could talk all she wants, but unless she follows through with her promise it won't mean a damn thing.

It was this realization that ultimately tipped the imaginary scale of decisions in Lauren's brain enough for her to make her decision. Despite initially beginning as an edgy and off-the-wall joke, Lauren decided that she would fulfill her promise to give up all of her clothing and spend the rest of her senior year in the buff. Lauren herself could barely believe that she had made the active decision to go completely naked everywhere when she had no real obligation to do so, other than her personal obligation to stay true to her word.

By this point, Lauren had dried off completely, so it was time for her to leave the bathroom. Taking one last look at her perky breasts, shaved crotch, and firm ass, Lauren opened the door of the bathroom and stepped into the hallway. Normally she would have wrapped a towel around herself as she returned to her bedroom to get dressed, but having made up her mind to give up clothes she instead simply left the towel in the bathroom and headed to the kitchen where her family was eating breakfast. She knew it would be hard, but she resolved to carry herself with poise and act unbothered by her nudity. Her mother, father, brother, and sister were all in the middle of eating the classic breakfast of bacon and eggs when they nearly choked upon witnessing the completely naked beauty enter the room.

"Morning!" Lauren said cheerfully, and a lot less nervously than what she felt inside. Nobody answered, though her brother and mom's mouths were open wide in disbelief. She sat down at the table and flashed a soft smile, fighting the urge to cover up.

"Wow, you weren't bullshittin' after all, were you?" her younger sister Jennifer asked with a grin, breaking the silence. As supporters of Trump, Jennifer and their father often teased Lauren about her promise after Lauren posted about it on social media. Though they were less shocked than Paul and their mother were about Lauren's nudity, none of them expected Lauren to actually go through with it. Yet, true to her word, Lauren showed up to the breakfast table wearing nothing but her birthday suit and a smile.

"Nope. The results definitely weren't what I was expecting at all, but a promise is a promise..." Lauren conceded. Though on the outside she impressive maintained composure, all sorts of nerves were running through her body. Nobody except for a couple boyfriends had seen her naked since before puberty; now her brother, sister, and parents had a completely unobstructed view of her boobs, and no doubt they saw her completely shaved pussy as she sat down. However, in the couple minutes since she first entered the room, she already felt a bit more comfortable being naked. At least in her own house; she didn't even want to think about what going to school would be like until that time came.

"Well, I think I speak for everyone when I say nobody actually thought you would do it. I mean, wow." her father said, still in slight disbelief at the sight before him.

"Yeah, I figured..." Lauren replied softly, trying to focus on finishing her breakfast. She could feel the eyes of the male members of her family on her body, and even
curious glances from her mother and sister. The family continued eating in relative silence until Jennifer spoke up again.

"So, I get the part about you being naked now, but what about your clothes? In your posts you mentioned giving up clothes for the rest of the year, what does that mean?"

"Honestly, I haven't even thought about that yet. I don't know what that means, myself. Just that I won't wear clothes for the rest of the year" Lauren answered.

"I think you should donate all of them." Paul, her brother said, speaking up for the first time since Lauren sat down. For someone whose jaw was to the floor for nearly the past five minutes, Paul voiced his suggestion rather nonchalantly.

Lauren's eyes went wide in shock.

"Donate?!"

"Yeah, why not? You're not wearing 'em, so they might as well go to someone who will. Plus, I know you aren't as confident in your...uh... nakedness as you're trying to appear, so it would also take away any temptation of breaking your promise by getting dressed." Paul elaborated.

Though shocked by the suggestion, Lauren conceded that it made some sense. Still, could she actually bring herself to donate every piece of clothing she owns?

Lauren excused herself from the table to finish getting ready for school. Her heart was racing; she had just begun what would undoubtedly the most interesting year of her life.

Then she remembered the looks on her father and sister's faces, and imagined what they would say if she backed out now. Not to mention all of her friends who were counting on her to keep her word. She hoisted her backpack over her shoulder and took one last look at herself in her bedroom mirror. This was it. The start of an experience that would no doubt change her life.

She was puzzled; normally she was the last one to get ready in the morning, and everyone was waiting for her when she got downstairs. Then she remembered that that was usually because she spent so much time getting dressed. She chuckled; at least there was one upside to the situation.

Eventually, her family had gotten together at the front door and was putting on their coats; with the obvious exception of Lauren. "Okay everyone, let's get going." Her father opened the door and everyone marched out, though Lauren paused just inside. "C'mon sweetie, you don't want to be late for the bus." Lauren closed her eyes and took a deep breath. This was it. Before she could talk herself out of it she stepped through the doorway and onto the porch.

1433311.content:
Judy Meyers had just graduated from college and wanted to celebrate. She saved up, packed her things, and was headed to Hawaii. She had never seen the ocean before, having loved in Indiana all her life. So, she was looking forward to being on the beach and relaxing while looking at the people. Unfortunately, her plane had an unexpected malfunction, and crash landed in the middle of the pacific ocean. The large aircraft had been destroyed upon impact, and many passengers were lost. Judy happened to be one of them, but she didn't die. Her row of seats was dislodged and flung half a mile away from the crash site. She regained consciousness in time to feel her neck dip below the water surface. Her seatbelt still fastened, the weight of the seat frame was pulling her down. She installed herself and pulled the seat cushion out to use as a flotation device. She didn't see anyone else in her row treading water, so she assumed they'd perished. She was too she'll shocked and exhausted to swim or look for any survivors, so she closed her eyes and floated along the current.

She awoke later on the shore of an island. She looked around and saw no one, and no sign of the plane. No debris had washed in with her, and she couldn't even see the wreck from where she was. She stood up, her wet clothes clinging to her. She felt a chill, so she looked around. Not seeing anyone nearby, she peeked off her dress and hung it from a nearby tree. With the sun still up, she warmed up quick, and set about looking for water and a place to set up camp. Being a fan of survival shows, she knew what to do. Or at least tried to. As she walked around the small island it became clear that she was alone, and had no way of contacting anyone. She made a mental note to write "HELP" as large as she could on the beach. Water was the most important thing. After two days, she had a shelter and a renewable water supply. She was able to finish her "HELP" sign and build a fire after another week. Soon, she forgot about her old life and tried to make the best of her time on the jsland.

As she subsisted on coconuts, berries, and whatever fish she was able to stab with a sharp stick, she waited for help that seemed less and less likely to come. She slowly lost weight due to her constant exercise and small diet. Her underwear no longer fit, despite her breasts not losing any of their volume. She instead fashioned a loincloth and a strap of cloth she tied between her breasts to cover herself. Her underwear was discarded or repurposed somehow. Her bra cups were very useful as actual cups to use for drinkong water from the creek. She got used to her simple life on the island, and soon didn't try to find a way back.

Two years later, she began to think about her future. She realized she didn't want to die on an island alone, and that her family and friends were likely missing her. She set about making a raft or some contraption to get her off the island. She had to sacrifice her remaining clothing and even what she wore to make an improvised raft and paddle. She got passed the breaks and onto the ocean, and found herself adrift. Days later, she was once again on a beach, but this time she knew it was inhabited. The beach was lacked full of people, and they seemed to be shocked to see a naked woman arrive on their beach. Judy hadn't seen another person in about 2 years, so it was hard for her to explain the situation. She walked away from her raft and approached a couple sunbathing. She was about to ask for help when a lifeguard grabbed her arm and pulled her to the shack they used as a holding cell.

The female lifeguard called the cops and she was promptly arrested. At the station, she was charged with public indecency and placed in a holding cell as her information was processed. After they ran her finger prints, they discovered she was declared dead, having died in a plane crash. They saw she wasn't from the state, so they had to contact her home state to explain the situation. Without any clothes, she was assumed to be a nudist now, and she was unaware of this. She was too overwhelmed to think about her nakedness, having spent so long with the same outfit. She wasn't as modest, but she was as shy as ever. She signed whatever forms they placed in front of her, and even got photos taken for her new ID in the buff before she started questioning their procedure. By then, it was too late. She was now a legal nudist, and she was going to be drives back to Indiana by the police to ensure her safety. As the trip went on, the naked Judy pondered how her friends and family will greet her, and if she could apply for work that wouldn't mind her nakedness.

How well does she adjust to her new life?

As she mixed the pancake batter in the bowl, she heard the telltale signs of her twins being up, namely the thumping of little feet and the two having an animated conversation about something they considered important. Pouring the batter on the pan caused the next expected reaction, the twins practically running down the stairs a top the smell of fresh pancakes.

"Pancakes!" They yelled, running into the kitchen, and Lilly suppressed a sigh as, once again, they were naked.

"Kids," she began, "how many time have I told you to stay dressed?" The twins looked at each other, then back at her, and shrugged. "I mean, I know you like it, but please, could you try just one morning?"
